Module org.nicholas.guicardealershipsystem
Package org.nicholas.guicardealershipsystem

Class CarDealershipController

java.lang.Object
org.nicholas.guicardealershipsystem.CarDealershipController
public class CarDealershipController extends Object
This class is focusing on all the logic of the application. This is what will be listening to the users input with all options that they have available. It will then handle all the interactions and show the changes or error messages.

    • getConnection

      private Connection getConnection(String filePath) throws SQLException
      Name: getConnection

      This is where the program will connect to the database from the url that is entered which is the path to your database.

      Parameters:
      filePath - sets the file path
      Returns:
      DriverManager.getConnection(url)
      Throws:
      SQLException - SQLException

    • loadCarsFile

      public void loadCarsFile(String filePath)
      Name: loadCarsFile

      This will load all the cars from the database file that the user chooses to upload and sorts them into the category from the file. This will be then seen in the tableView.

      Parameters:
      filePath - sets the file path

    • editCarDialog

      private void editCarDialog(Car selectedCar, String filePath)
      Name: FXML editCarDialog

      This will allow the user to edit the car that they have selected from the view. I made it to where the user has to enter numbers for the year and price field. They will be able to save the changes that were made or cancel them.

      Parameters:
      selectedCar - gets selected car to be edited
      filePath - sets the file path

    • uploadFile

      private void uploadFile()
      Name: FXML uploadFile

      This is what the user will be seeing when they select the upload File button. It is made to where the user can only select a SQL or SQLite file.

      public void editSelectedCar(String filePath)
      Name: editSelectedCar

      Parameters:
      filePath - sets the file path

      private void removeFilteredCars(String filePath)
      Name: removeFilteredCars

      (HANDLE DATABASE) This will allow the user to remove the car that they want by entering something in one of the options for the filter and be able to remove based on what they have entered.

      Parameters:
      filePath - sets the file path
